revised_title: The Impact of Agricultural Productivity on the Nitrogen Cycle
tldr: This article discusses the relationship between agricultural productivity and the nitrogen cycle in the UK. It highlights the increase in fertilizer use over the years and its impact on the environment, including water quality and potential health hazards. The author also examines the energy consumption in agriculture and the need for more precise methods in measuring the amount of nitrogen needed for crops.
